President @fhollande will attend this afternoon the signing of an agreement between @UNESCO and @Inria #UnescoInria
This partnership aims to lead joint projects to help preserve, make accessible technological and scientific knowledge
This cooperation will be based in particular on the Software Heritage initiative @UNESCO_en @Inria #UnescoInria
Software Heritage aims to collect, organize and make available to all the source code of all available software
Software Heritage is already the most important source code archive on the planet.
Software Heritage contains more than 55 million software projects, with more than three billion unique source files
